title: AXOPAY Digital Wallet Platform Frontend Implementation

file_operations.description: Create client dashboard page displaying wallet balance (Main, Earnings, Withdrawal), active plan, ROI progress bar, total earnings, referral income, binary income, withdrawable balance, team size, and recent transactions table. requirements.summary: Implement wallet features for deposits, withdrawals, transfers, and currency conversion
acceptanceCriteria: Users can initiate deposits with external gateway integration placeholder
Withdrawal requests are created and pending admin approval

Currency conversion uses configured exchange rates

file_operations.description: Create wallet management page with tabs for Deposit, Withdraw, Transfer, Convert, and History. Display three wallet types prominently. Fetch data using React Query hooks from backend.
Create deposit form component with amount input, wallet selection (Main), currency dropdown, and placeholder payment gateway integration message. Submit deposit request to backend.

Create withdrawal form component with amount input, source wallet (Withdrawal), withdrawal method selection, and OTP verification before submission. Submit withdrawal request to backend for admin approval.
Create internal transfer form with recipient user ID input, amount, source wallet selection, and confirmation modal. Submit transfer to backend for instant processing.
Create currency conversion form with from/to currency dropdowns, amount input, live exchange rate display, and convert button. Submit conversion request to backend.

Create transaction history component with filters for date range, transaction type (Deposit, Withdraw, Transfer, Conversion), and status. Display paginated table with all transactions fetched from backend.

Add protected route for /wallet requiring user authentication
